website_summaries.verdict: A moderately-priced boot that performs exceptionally well in the wintertime.
pros: Comes in gray, khaki, or tan
Offers good waterproofing, grip, and warmth for winter wear
cons: Some problems reported with the eyelets either breaking off or cutting laces

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart after 1 month.
customer_reviews.text: They look great, feel good,and are nice and warm. However, after 3 weeks of wearing them to work they are already falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: Tim M

customer_reviews.title: Decent, but pricey
customer_reviews.text: I searched for weeks. Most waterproof/snow boots are ugly. Finally found these. Had them for about two months. I'll give you some pros and cons. Pros: I normally wear 10.5-11. These are right around the proper fit front to back. Water proofing is great. No weird squeaking. Decent grip in snow and ice. Cons: Color is not gray, they are blue. Fit is a bit wide, 4th grommet on both shoes are showing signs of lossening.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: I friggen love these things
customer_reviews.text: I friggen love these things. We got some snow here in Mississippi and it’s always wet muddy snow and these boots were awesome. We got 7” and my feet stayed warm and dry. They are very comfortable too. They aren’t not slip on indoor floors though, but I didn’t buy them for the indoors so harm no fowl. A+ boots. Worth $60. Size was pretty accurate too.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Edgar

customer_reviews.title: This woman LOVESLOVES these boots!!!
customer_reviews.text: I run a donkey sanctuary and am on my feet all day. I have plantar fasciitis and have tried many, more expensive brands. As a woman, finding boots that have a wider toe box and waterproof and comfortable without spending a small fortune is near impossible. These boots are so comfortable and have allowed me to feel good for my 12+ hour days. Really, you can't go wrong with Skechers! I wish I had thought of this brand sooner as I would have saved myself a lot of money. I've been wearing these for over a month and they still feel awesome. I wear a woman's size 9 and got these in an 8 and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: DonkeyMom

customer_reviews.title: 13 Upside Down M
customer_reviews.text: If the old woman had had one of these, she would've been able to have 2 or 3 more children. For some reason shoe makers now assume that "long" means "wide." Although these are a 13M, my foot wobbled back and forth and up and down so much inside that I can only imagine in horror the blisters that would develop. These are not "medium" width. So I'm guessing these were a misprint and instead of M they meant to flip that over to W. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: D.Reed

customer_reviews.title: Not your typical Skecher comfirt
customer_reviews.text: They are stiffer than I expected them to be. I ordered the Skecher brand because of the typical comfort they offer. This pair is not nearly as comfortable as the other pairs of Skecher shoe I have purchased. They do appear to be made with quality materials and the sizing was as expected. Not too big or too small.
customer_reviews.author: Read-aholic

customer_reviews.title: Boots are well built and comfortable, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: Boots are well built and comfortable, especially for the price, but they slip on the heel and gap a bit, even on big fat feet. I normally wear a 12, but these are sized oddly in that they fit in the length but the extra give through the foot makes them slip on the heel. If they don't fit me I can't imagine most people would have a good fit with these boots. That said, they are nicely cushioned and light--good for summer hiking, which is why they were purchased. Unfortunately I wore them in wetlands before I realized the fit was off, or I would have returned them.
customer_reviews.author: A. White

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Sketcher Chuka "boots" are great. They are comfortable and waterproof. And design is terrific.
customer_reviews.author: M. White

customer_reviews.title: Not so comfortable :(
customer_reviews.text: First I want to say they look very cool and they are really worm, but I could not say they are comfortable as hiking boots must be. When I'm walking fabric on the right boot fold in and it pushes very painfully, I'm afraid I could not use them for long distance walking, for what I brought this boots.
customer_reviews.author: Dimm

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Durable - Waterproof as a Bonus
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable, fits extremely well, arrived as a new product (not used or anything sketchy like that). Waterproof, really durable, I love them. I don't actually do any activities that necessarily require boots unlike other people on here. I just wanted a pair of comfortable high quality boots that would last longer than cheaply made shoes. Also, in the winter we tend to get a lot of snow and slush and usually if I wear shoes they get wet by the end of the day. These are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Jasper

customer_reviews.title: Great boots durable
customer_reviews.text: These boots are great I usually don't write reviews they have help up great so far very comfortable for the Boston winter weather with snow ice and salt,so worth it and great priceI would deffantly buy again ,bought my dad a pair he loves them.also Im a 13w I bought a size 14 they fit perfect ,sizes on sketchers are the best the only shoe and boot I'll buy, Update: been using them in snow salt,climbing ladders scaling roofs still are in perfect shape and really comfertable. Update March 5th 2019 - boots still strong and waterproof still holding up went plowing and shoveling this whole winter 1 yr 3 months great boots
customer_reviews.author: Smith's

customer_reviews.title: 2 right foot boots
customer_reviews.text: Have been wearing and happy with this boot for 2-3 years. Ordered a new pair in mid April but didn't need them then. Opened the box today and I got 2 right foot boots. Sadly I'm stuck with them as the window for returning closed in mid May. Now, yes I should have checked them out when they arrived. But I didn't. So I'm stuck with 2 right foot boots and Amazon won't help even tho it was them I ordered the boots through. Who is more at fault? Me or Amazon? Me for being stupid or Amazon for being incompetent and careless?
customer_reviews.author: Greg Gossard

customer_reviews.title: Walked 50 miles in these while in London
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome shoes very comfortable. Walked 50 miles in these in London in rain and cold. I highly recommend these for outdoor activities and city walking in cold rainy weather.
customer_reviews.author: Mei S.

customer_reviews.title: Small Size
customer_reviews.text: Dear if you are guided by the table I must tell you to request one more size, unfortunately I am traveling and when I went to use it did not fit well, I ended up giving it away, it was more expensive to return to my country and change them. Think before you buy them.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Gambetta

customer_reviews.title: thought sketchers would have been made better
customer_reviews.text: Is almost to the 6 month mark and the hooks on both boots are breaking right off. These are not worn every day and really should have lasted longer
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Beware, Lace Cleat breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing these shoes for 3 months now and yesterday I noticed my shoe was untied. The top Lace Cleat was broken off. I do not tie my laces all that tight. Buyer beware. Also, the Waterproof metal badge fell off. Otherwise good comfortable shoe just has the one major flaw like some of the others have warned. Shoes are only 3 months old.
customer_reviews.author: Justin B.

customer_reviews.title: Oh, Skechers, you really screwed up
customer_reviews.text: I love my Skechers shoes. I hate these Skechers 'boots.' Remember the cheap felt your Mom made your Halloween costume from when you were a kid? That left-over felt made it into a 'boot.' Two minutes onto a trail and a twig - not a stick - a twig poked a hole through the side of the 'boot.' What a disappointment. The 'boots' are certainly Skechers comfortable, but these aren't durable enough for a walk in a city park unless all the twigs have been picked up first. Sending them back ... and a HUGE kudo to Amazon for making returns so easy
customer_reviews.author: Wooch

customer_reviews.title: Best workboots ever!
customer_reviews.text: During my husbands 38 year electrical journeyman career he has never had a more perfect pair of boots. He said these are the best work boots he has ever had! Comfortable,lightweight,attractive for long days commuting to NYC, walking and working. I ordered two more pairs so that if this style and color is discontinued he will still be able to wear them! We project that the pair he has been wearing and the two additional pairs will take him into retirement with warm, dry, comfortable feet!
customer_reviews.author: P Hayden

customer_reviews.title: Skechers Men's Boot
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these boots as a replacemnt and because they were selling at a reasonable price, but not now. These boot are worth $50.00 not $90 as the current price. Aside from the price, these boots are very comfortable and durable. I was pleased with my purchase but would not purchase them for $90.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Lavoie

customer_reviews.title: Durable and comfortable for work outdoors.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for work in my lawn maintenance business. I had bought the Skechers Blais Celek in the past and wanted to try a different one because I’d always wear out the rubber soles in three months. The soles on these held up much better and didn’t wear thru, but the leather seams where the rubber toe is sewn into the leather cracked and made a 1/2” hole/tear. I would still recommend these because they are very comfortable for working outside and on your feet all day and want to stay dry.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Mulaik

customer_reviews.title: Boots like good, nice style
customer_reviews.text: The hiking boots look great, except that they were too tight at ankle, I have a normal foot, by this I am, I don't have fatty ankles, however the shoes/boots were very uncomfortable on top, I tried to wear them tight on half ways, but they were very uncomfortable and also the laces keep on coming undone within a few paces. I did not like them and had them returned.
customer_reviews.author: Will Star

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made shoes should have rubber not plastic
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these shoes because I just had the exact same thing before from a shoe store, but this pair the steel eyelets both broke off very easy I never had that happen in the two years plus I had the last pair. Also the toe Cover is plastic And is very weak and coming off already. This was bad use of money As far as Quility goes for these shoes had them about three months now. Note: But after talking about it with Amazon they r sending a free new pair so it’s going to be fine.
customer_reviews.author: MoparMode

customer_reviews.title: Good looking boot
customer_reviews.text: When I first received these I was impressed by how comfortable they were. Hiking boots generally aren't nice looking but these are fairly stylish. Waterproof. I only take a star off because it hasn't been a year and they are tearing at the side. I'm still deciding rather or not to re-buy them or try something else that may perhaps last longer as my boots prior lasted a good few years
customer_reviews.author: Asterisk

customer_reviews.title: Ouch
customer_reviews.text: Were fine the first couple days for work, these really ****** up my feet! Bad! I started wearing sneakers again, feet healed up, put these back on as a test, pain came back. Something is wrong with the cushions inside or something. And laces snap easy, little hooks are like little knifes, will need to dull them up. I'm getting some Dr Scholls to see if it will fix the problem. They are warm and waterproof, thank jimmy its summer, put these away in the closet.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable and Good Looking Boots
customer_reviews.text: These boots were comfortable the first time I put them on. They are a little stiff but most new shoes/boots are when they are new and the more I wear them around the house the more comfortable they are. I would definitely recommend them if you are looking for a comfortable lightweight boot. FYI I just ordered a second pair in brown.
customer_reviews.author: john d. mcintosh

customer_reviews.title: Good Boots
customer_reviews.text: Well put together boots. The traction on the sole, although not non-slip, gives good traction on ice and snow. I can't verify the waterproof aspect, since I haven't worn them in rain, but my feet stay dry in snow. As far as comfort.... I mean it's a boot not a sneaker. They have padding in them, but for as much as I walk everyday I ended up putting a cushion insert in mine. I wear an 11 1/2 and they fit perfectly, even with the insert. For me, at least. I can see having them for years as they're very well built.
customer_reviews.author: David Mejia

customer_reviews.title: A good bet if your toes are wide.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 12.5 wide, and the size 13 regular work better than most other brands. They say relaxed fit on them and its true. There is enough room for my toes. A little heavy, and not quite my style at all. More comfortable than Columbia with the memory foam. These check most of the important boxes, and don't cost too much. Can't complain. I'm not really a Skechers guy, but will probably use them for doing work outside or mucking around.
customer_reviews.author: John Dandell

customer_reviews.title: Did not fit
customer_reviews.text: I have had several pairs of Skechers shoes and I've used the same size throughout. These were too small for some reason. I sent them back for the half size bigger, and they were too big! I have a local Skechers outlet store in town, so they said to stop by and try them on in store. They would be happy to do an exchange. Still a big fan of Skechers products.
customer_reviews.author: Joe L.

customer_reviews.title: Contractors beware
customer_reviews.text: These lasted a whole 3 weeks before becoming useless. They are probably good for hiking or something but physical laborers who need work boots should keep shopping. despite being comfortable they unfortunately didn't last long.
customer_reviews.author: MamaX3

customer_reviews.title: They work-i might love them after they're broken in
customer_reviews.text: The sole is very comfortable. The outer sole has good grip on trails and rock. The shaft just above the ankle towards the front of the foot is a little stiff and can become uncomfortable when accending an incline. They are waterproof-tested on first hike in rain and lots of icemelt and mud. The metal eyelets are good though these seem like they might be more flimsy than a more expensive/higher quality boot. Overall for the price-excellent boot.
customer_reviews.author: Wtfwasithinking

customer_reviews.title: Great look, Great boots
customer_reviews.text: Love the look. I've only had them for a few days but I work out doors, on a horse farm. My boots take a beating. These seem to be up for the job though. I'll have to see how long they last. Also they are super comfy. I was pleasently surprised by that. I'm now on my 3rd pair... Maybe a year later. Each set of boots lasted 3-4 months. That's working every day, all day. In rain, mud, muck, snow, tornados 🤷‍♀️ These boots kept me dry and kinda warm. Super comfy. They really don't break down quickly at all. I highly recommend them 😊
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Read my re
customer_reviews.text: A couple of things to know before to buy these shoes. Pros: 1. Great stylish shoes. 2. Good shoes to walk on mountains. Cons: 1. Not waterproof, after a couple of small rains on Paris, the water started to enter on the shoes. 2. Not for use on cities, if you plan to use it like your main shoes on a long trip and you have cities to visit and you want to walk with these ones, will start eventually to feel a lot of pain on the heel of the foot. There are not designed to walk on cities.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian

customer_reviews.title: 5stars
customer_reviews.text: I drive trucks and use the boots on a everyday bases, through rain , wind , hot days and they are the most comfortable boots I’ve used .I’ve been using these boots for 2 years I just reorder over and over. Flexible and sturdy deff recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Skechers always comes through! I held off on rating this shoe until I took vacation to Ecuador. The shoes held up just great for a long trip that included hikes in the Galapagos, and travels into the Amazon basin. They could not be better. The shoes fit perfect, are great for long hikes on rough terrain, and are very comfortable. These are keepers
customer_reviews.author: Eric Hirsch

customer_reviews.title: Too small, pay to ship and to return
customer_reviews.text: The boots look great but they're tighter than other boots I have at the same size. I recommend ordering at least half a size larger, to avoid the hassle and expense of returning them. You pay to have them shipped to you and then again for returning because they're too small :-/
customer_reviews.author: Doron Bracha

customer_reviews.title: Light and comfortable boots
customer_reviews.text: I was replacing a pair of work boots that were very heavy so these feel like feathers on my feet. I have walked through a deep puddle with them and I stayed dry. I also like that they don't pinch my feet when I kneel down, not sure what causes that but these don't do it. I've only had them for a month, so I can't say much about how they will last, but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Da Slug

customer_reviews.title: Water resistant or waterproof which is it
customer_reviews.text: These boots were claimed to be waterproof they were not and they wore out very quickly I was very disappointed because all I own is Skechers when I called Skechers their office was closed because of the pandemic couldn’t even leave a message disappointed I called Amazon and they referred me to Skechers because I had to boat more than 30 days again very disappointed would not recommend poorly labeled waterproof and water resistant is not the same thanks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Boots
customer_reviews.text: What an awesome pair of boots. I was really impressed with them, good for the Winter in The North Country. I have heard of Skechers before long time ago, now that I have them they look stunning. And even the laces are all alignment up too. I like the industrial grey to that as well. They have a nice feeling when I walk in them around the house to try out, because there's just no snow and ice just yet. 💖👍😎👍
customer_reviews.author: Rudy Toth

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are soooo heavy.
customer_reviews.text: My husband tried them on in the house. He walked around in the house for about 5 minutes. He had to take them off. He said his back started to hurt. Initially they feel soft and comfortable but too heavy to be comfortable. I would like to return these and get another pair of sketchers as this is the brand he likes but I don't see an option in my order to print a return label.
customer_reviews.author: Eli

customer_reviews.title: Not a good long term boot
customer_reviews.text: They were great boots for a while. They fit as expected and were decently water resistant at first. After a while the seal at the front of the sole started to crack and then all the waterproofing went out the door. I walk for 14 hrs a day 6 days a week and these lasted 3 months. These would be good for recreational use but seeing as they upped the price by $35 since I purchased them, Ill try another boot this time around.
customer_reviews.author: Si

customer_reviews.title: Almost 5 star
customer_reviews.text: The shoe was perfect fit and the foot cushion is pretty good. I tested it on rainy day. It's really a waterproof shoe. During winter it didn't kept me warm. I felt like I should have worn two layers of shocks. With one shocks in winter it will keep you cold in snowy day. That's why I gave it 4 instead of 5. Overall I like it and happy with my purchase. I have always loved skechers.
customer_reviews.author: JAY R

customer_reviews.title: Great for my working men.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of these for my husband a year ago and he wore them all day, every day, and loved them. A year later he was ready for a new pair and wanted to make sure I got him the exact same ones. Then I had to buy another pair for another member of the family who wanted a pair too! Sketchers makes good quality comfortable shoes. These are definitely a winner.
customer_reviews.author: Lauri - Family Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great work boots extremely waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I'm a size 14 wide and it fits perfect I used these as work boot that I also wore to walk to work. I've worn them in all conditions from snow to thick mud. I was extremely impressed when I walked in ankle high water and my socks remained dry. I recommend this to anyone looking to long lasting waterproof boots in large sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Pickard

customer_reviews.title: Comfort & truely waterproof - good shoe
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were purchased for my husband who is a truck driver & is very hard on everything he wears. They were so comfortable my brother also bought a pair. 1st full day of wearing they were in pouring rain - I noticed his socks were dry so waterproof works well too. Wear & year seem to have held up good too but is only day 1. Colors are nice too black is like a charcoal grey which I like better anyway - hubby likes so will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Matt McMullen

customer_reviews.title: Great for work.
customer_reviews.text: My coworkers keep making fun of them and saying that I look like I'm about to go mountain climbing, but I don't care. They're pretty light for what they are and they haven't started breaking at all besides a small hole inside the shoe that doesn't hurt anything. It did rub against my right big toe pretty bad, causing it to blister, but it calised up and now it's unnoticeable. I do dumb things at work like drag empty pallets around with my feet and it destroyed my last pair of shoes, but these don't show any damage so far besides some paint from the pallets getting onto the front of the shoes. Overall a pretty strong shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: These are the boots you want.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 9.5US size that fit comfortably with thin socks. I had been wearing another boot that was a size 10US and needed to wear a thick sock because of the extra space inside of the boot. I like these much better at the correct size. These took one day to break them in and now are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: John Sachs

customer_reviews.title: This is not used
customer_reviews.text: I could not believe when I receive these boots that Amazon consider them used. Obviously, they must’ve been returned but clearly they were not worn outside. The boots fit perfectly and are extremely comfortable.. The fact that the boots are also waterproof is an added bonus. This is one of the best purchases I’ve ever made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable boots, water resistant, so far so good.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable, I’m on my feet 11-12 hours a day and these stayed comfortable all day. Seem to be waterproof though I haven’t given them a serious water test yet. One downside is it’s hard to keep them clean and to clean them after they get stained at all, have had them a few weeks and so far they have stayed intact. Would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Skg11178

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good...
customer_reviews.text: I have only worn the boots a few times since I received them. But, so far they are good, still breathing them in. The only problem thus far is the 'WATERPROOF' tab on the outside of the boot that sticks out. The right side has already got caught on something and popped off. Now there are two holes in the side of the right boot. Seems to be an unnecessary tab. Besides that, so far so good. May update my review after further wear.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Lamb

customer_reviews.title: 2nd pair totally uncomfortable!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd pair I have bought for my husband. The 1st pair was and still is amazing in comfort!! This pair it's like it has no insole and has terrible support the exact same shoe, same size, and width. Not sure if I'll buy again or not as these are his work boots and comfort is a must. The first pair has held up great not sure why so different!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica1617

customer_reviews.title: Great Hiking Boots
customer_reviews.text: These boots are great for hiking rocky terrain and grip very well. They are also more comfortable than I expected them to be. I have gone on several 3+ mile hikes since getting them and my feet don't hurt when I am done which is way more than I can say about my last pair of boots.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Brier

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable for truck driving
customer_reviews.text: Fits comfortable warm and stays dry on wet weather. Sizing is perfect just as described. Really like these sketchers. Update: I am a construction truck driver so I want to say I use it more then just driving. 10 months later and the one of them is leaking and taking in water. Comfort wise they are great to walk on still.
customer_reviews.author: The Arthur’s

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof slippers with laces
customer_reviews.text: Love/hate product. These boots have no identity in my view. because the have little support even sized properly. If squishy = comfort they are a plus. I like to wear my slippers but I would not like to walk very far in them. They would not be a good choice for work unless your job doesn't require much physical activity,
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for a few months now and use them daily to walk the dog in the woods. They are exceedingly comfortable and fit my 9 1/2 EEE foot well. They are waterproof so far. They are comfortable enough, and give good support that I sometimes forget I'm wearing boots. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Love the boots
customer_reviews.text: Love the boots. Purchased for my husband. I couldn't get over how lightweight they are as he has another pair of skechers that are heavy. Made well and can't wait to see how they fair on our trip to Colorado
customer_reviews.author: Danielle H.

customer_reviews.title: Wide in the toe box.
customer_reviews.text: Let me start of by saying the retailer has been awesome. I received my boots within a few days. Packaging was good. I tried them on. Ho hum, too wide at the ball and toes for me. I contacted the retailer. No drama whatsoever. I returned them the next day for credit.
customer_reviews.author: Richard C Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Soggy hurt box
customer_reviews.text: The images go out of their way to conceal the fact that this has a narrow, pointed toe box. It left me injured and in pain walking downhill. But the injury was not as bad as the one caused by the rigid panel sewn into the side that jabbed me in the ankle with each step and left me bruised and blistered. As pointed out in another review, this boot is NOT waterproof. The material becomes saturated with water relatively quickly, though when new it takes a long time to reach your socks. However, when that water is around the freezing point you'll notice before it reaches your feet.
customer_reviews.author: Botany Boy

customer_reviews.title: Total Garbage. Do Not Buy
customer_reviews.text: These are flimsy, weak, oversized sneakers. They are not work boots. Certainly not for a working man. They are made of junk materials and show crap workmanship. They are made so poorly that they can't be tied tightly. So the cheaply made and poorly installed hooks pull straight out of the crap "leather" when you try. I wore mine twice before they disintegrated. These things are absolute garbage. You would be better off going barefoot. Total crap do not buy. In fact you would be insane to buy Sketchers anything. Total garbage. Do not buy Sketchers anything ever.
customer_reviews.author: Disapointed

customer_reviews.title: hard to tie
customer_reviews.text: Now this boot was a perfect fit and very comfy out of the box, usually I have to put in double cushion insoles in new boots, but nothing so far in these...BUT, I don't like the loops for the laces, they are the kind that won't let you pull the laces thru and if you do it starts cutting the laces, Not to thrilled about that...needs more customer favorable loops and laces
customer_reviews.author: Wild 58

customer_reviews.title: They are great work boots for people out in the elements
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my husband to see if he liked them. He had purchased a very expensive pair from Cabelas and I bought these as a back up pair. He likes these more than the pair he bought at Cabelas. He states that they are more comfortable and flexible o get around in. A very tough pair of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: luz

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I found that these boots are not waterproof only in spring when snow started to melt. Since I was wearing it for a few months I cannot return it. Well... Will keep it and wear only in very cold weather. My recommendation - stay away
customer_reviews.author: Amerald

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for..
customer_reviews.text: These are great! They are water RESISTANT not water proof but for my job they provide exactly what is needed to do the job and stay dry. The fit is very comfortable as well. Highly recommend these boots to anyone looking for something safe and dry.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: soggy socks
customer_reviews.text: If you want waterproof....spray that protectant all over and add at least two coats, think of it like painting a wall....Primer coat, then Paint. They are water repellant, but not waterproof. They fit is great and comfort is too. I work as a meat cutter and have to clean equipment at the end of the day. Waterproof your boots before use or hang your wet socks over the shower curtain rod to dry before throwing them in the hamper.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Shaw

customer_reviews.title: A good pair of hiking boots
customer_reviews.text: Bought these boots for a trip to the sierras. Spent time hiking Yosemite Valley over the winter and the boots performed admirably. They were a good fit, easy to break in, I was able walk miles in them straight away they are very comfortable. The boots handled the snow and ice well, walking over rock I never felt I was going to slip nor could I feel the rocks through the soles. Time will tell if they go the distance, and how they compare to more expensive mountain boots with regard to durability.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Bateman

customer_reviews.title: nice construction
customer_reviews.text: I was a little concerned with comfort when I first got these. took about 2 weeks to break in. If you are planning to use on extended hike make sure you plan a couple weeks of 1 hour per day use to break them in
customer_reviews.author: kleinfe1

customer_reviews.title: Great quality very comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: Only had them for a few days but quality seems to be great. The shoe is a little roomy which I like so I can wear a heavier sock. The thing that impressed me the most is that they were very comfortable to wear right out of the box. I think they run a tad small as I had to exchange mine for a 1/2 size larger. I think it is a great shoe for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Kris Hall

customer_reviews.title: Painfull
customer_reviews.text: These were the most uncomfortable boots I have ever bought. I really like Sketchers and had high hopes for these boots. Another thing also is the sewing came apart at the toes after a bit.
customer_reviews.author: B. Lane

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves these boots for yard work etc. The only thing is the toe box isn't very well made. It is peeling. Maybe a heavy duty rubber toe box would be better. Will buy again because of comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Acorn girl

customer_reviews.title: China Shoes Don't Fit
customer_reviews.text: Shoes made in China usually don't fit. I take a size 11 and this boot was both too narrow and too small. This had to be returned. Either go to a shoe store and try the shoe on, or else buy American if possible.
customer_reviews.author: Casan

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort and durability
customer_reviews.text: This the second pair of this boot that I’ve ordered for my husband. He works in construction. The first pair held up for more than a year. He likes the comfort and fit of the boot. He often leaves them on even after he comes home from work.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Brewster

customer_reviews.title: Sketchers are usually the best
customer_reviews.text: These did not hold up so well, I only buy sketchers brand if I can help it, but these got damaged really quickly and didn't seem as high quality. They fit as expected and were comfortable, but they become un-wearable within about 8 months. Not worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Clifton

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and fit
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, I ordered a mens size 12 which is the same size as my Skecher shoes and they fit perfectly. Wore them all day and have no complaints at all, very comfortable and with great foot support. I like the fact they are also light weight.
customer_reviews.author: gamt

customer_reviews.title: great shoe
customer_reviews.text: no break in period, fits and wears perfectly right out of the box. this is my second pair. my only complaint is the quality of the shoe laces is rather poor, only lasted around 6 months. I do not treat the leather with mink oil or anything and literally stand in water or walk in snow and my feet have never gotten wet!
customer_reviews.author: bobj

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These boots are pretty comfortable and I only needed a couple of wears to break them in. My only complaint is that the upper is not quite snug for my liking. Otherwise, nice boot for Spring weather.
customer_reviews.author: db

customer_reviews.title: Great work boots for a farm
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband who works outside all day on our farm. His work boots take a beating! He says that these are very lightweight, comfortable and are wearing great!
customer_reviews.author: Terri Gratton

customer_reviews.title: Runs Narrow; Had to Return; Not Available in Wide Sizes
customer_reviews.text: I so much wanted to keep these boots; was hoping for something different than the typical "Work Boot", but these were just too narrow. To be fair, this review is only to serve as a warning about width. A comprehensive review is not possible without wearing shoes; I own other styles of Skechers shoes--No Complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Ross Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair we have bought. The first pair was great . This pair is bad. The left shoe is falling apart. The metal hooks for the shoestring are breaking and the logo is falling off. I'm very disappointed with the quality of this show. If there was a way to return them I would.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: I love this boots. Fit well and hold up. I wear these boots every day for about 12 hours and my feet feel great. Skechers have done it again and hopefully they don't try and change anything
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Easy to break in. I need to use scholls gel insoles due to high arches and arthritis. Insoles fit great and still plenty of room with a thick wool sock. I bought a half size up. But that’s due to my “wonderful feet”.
customer_reviews.author: McG

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the Price
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid product. I purchased Sketchers because I knew how they would fit. Comfortable and warm and just what I expected for the price. I’m a landscaper and they are my go to boots. The one thing I don’t like is how close the hooks are for the shoe laces. Sometimes I have trouble tying them. The laces broke after a few months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Lightning Helix

customer_reviews.title: Excellent comfortable boot
customer_reviews.text: Was recently diagnosed with plantis facitus so I needed a comfortable boot with a ton of support. Put these on and there is no pain when walking. Fantastic boot. Hopefully they will come out with an all black.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Bianchi

customer_reviews.title: Nice and warm!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a trip, but roads were closed due to weather. My husband wore these out during a cooler day and said @these are really warm”. They fit perfect. I ordered a size 10.5 his normal size.
customer_reviews.author: Azmom3

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Boot/shoe for work
customer_reviews.text: Good boots. I had bought my husband some expensive Carhartt boots and they wore out. The Carhartt were 5x the price We tried these and they are holding up better. He uses them for work and is on his feet all day
customer_reviews.author: Jason & Erica Drum

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I walk in wet grass every morning. Not soaked or worse, just wet grass and my feet are wet after the first hour. They should sell these boots as water resistant. They are not waterproof. I love Skechers but they fell short on this one
customer_reviews.author: Fer Vc

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof for sure.
customer_reviews.text: As of now been using them for disc golf they're very water proof not a drop of water has touched my feet, even walked through some 4 to 5 inch stretchs of water they dried right off like a turtles shell and I must say after a 2 day break in period they're super comfy now, The inserts started to peel up at the heels so I pulled them out and put some Merrell inserts in which u can buy for 8 bucks free shipping just Google it now they are absolutely perfect for disc golf. I will be buying another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Candice Marshburn

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality
customer_reviews.text: Not the quality I am used to from Schechers. The eye loops shredded the laces and they are showing signs of coming apart on the sides and the toe section is bending/curling up. Would not buy again
customer_reviews.author: Eddie L.

customer_reviews.title: Looks and fit great
customer_reviews.text: This was for my son. It came just in time for a weekend skiing. He said it is very comfy and it kept his feet warm. I would buy one again! The price point is reasonable and he loves it. What more can I ask for.
customer_reviews.author: Mvc617

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband because his feet would get cold in his work boots. He has used these boots multiple times to clear snow from the driveway and deck. He is amazed that his feet didn't get wet or cold. He thanks me for buying them every time he wears them!
customer_reviews.author: Turtle

customer_reviews.title: Very good value
customer_reviews.text: These are very good boots. I’ve had them fire several weeks. I work 4 days a week, walking 5-7 miles a day. These feel good and are holding up well. You won’t regret the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: PJP

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but kind of unreliable
customer_reviews.text: I'm wearing these shoes for 2 months so far. Big city conditions, 2-4 hours a day every day, literally, nothing else special. Result for now on next. Pluses: it's waterproof indeed, very comfortable, genuine leather. Minuses: it's sole is VERY slippery on the wet tile (I slipped and dropped painfully couple times), both shoelaces replaced due to friction damage on last (upper) eyelets, yesterday I found broken hook eyelet when I was replacing laces set, inner lining has some friction damage. See photos.
customer_reviews.author: Igor Vladimirskiy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent comfort
customer_reviews.text: I love them but upper eyelet popped out after only a week. They fit perfectly. They are warm with hiking sox and just right with regular athletic sox. I especially like that the sole doesn't loudly *clop-clop* loudly on house floors.
customer_reviews.author: Tenni

customer_reviews.title: Really well made hiking boots.
customer_reviews.text: The boots are waterproof as described. Accidentally tested that feature by stepping into a stream that was ankle deep. No water got in, and my feet were dry and comfy. Give them a few days to break in, around the ankle can be a little stiff at first. The insole is memory foam, and you can tell within your first step. Went on several mountain hikes, and there was no pain or discomfort. If you purchase these boots, you will be happy that you did.
customer_reviews.author: Sean S.

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable !!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable better than I expected shoelaces have not broken yet like some people indicated but they won't stay tied that's the only bad thing I had to say about the shoes
customer_reviews.author: Sinbad

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable boots- on my feet all day everyday day
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these boots. I have very picky feet. I’m on my feet all day. I do masonry -construction work. This is my second pair. The last pair lasted a year- as expected in my line of boots. I definitely recommend these boots. They fit true to their size as well. Highly recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: greg

customer_reviews.title: adequate
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased many pair of Skechers shoes in the past and thought these boots would be a nice pair also. A little disappointed in these as they are somewhat more narrow than past shoes.
customer_reviews.author: R. Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Skechers Lost My Business
customer_reviews.text: They are a comfortable boot but I'm six weeks in and the shoestring just popped because they use metal eyes and they cut into the strings. I wouldnt buy these again because I see its something that's going to keep happening Update. I emailed their customer service about the shoestrings and over 2 weeks and no reply and today the shoestring completely snapped. Time to change brands.
customer_reviews.author: Carson101boss

customer_reviews.title: In my case my usual size was too small
customer_reviews.text: A little tight in the toe area, sent back, account was issued a credit (online gift card) before they arrived back at amazon, ordered 10 M, which arrived 8/16 and fit better. Great customer service as usual.
customer_reviews.author: bcsparks

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My hubby loves his shoes he said they fit and feel very good on his feet. He says when these wears out he wants another pair just like them. He says they are roomy, comfortable, and good for everyday wear.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Gayheart

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my husband. He has only worn them a few times so far but says they are very comfortable and likes them! I am only giving 4 stars at this point as I'm not sure how well they will hold up after some use.
customer_reviews.author: h

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoe/boot for the money
customer_reviews.text: Giving this 5 stars for fit and comfort. Fits as expected, very comfortable. The memory foam makes it feel like you're walking on a thick sponge... very nice! Will wait & see how long these hold up.
customer_reviews.author: MD42

product_meta.title: Skechers Men's Relment Pelmo Chukka Waterproof Boot
